gate.termraider.bank

Class AbstractBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageResource
          • gate.termraider.bank.AbstractBank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.LanguageResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPairbank, AbstractTermbank

    public abstract class AbstractBank
extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageResource
    A thing that has a score name, can be saved as CSV, and can be used to generate a SliderPanel (which needs min & max scores).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
